attributes.action: stop taking student loans into account when assessing means tested benefits !!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its ridiculous that individuals are trying to achieve an education in this country and are trying to better thier future , yet when it comes to studying and asking for financial assistance for housing benefit , income support or council tax benefit - student LOANS are taken into account as income , and we are penilised even though we have to repay them WITH interest after graduating !! What about the single parents for example bringing up a child AND studying !!
